mapper.select: select sell_pronum ,sell_cash, sell_memnum, to_char(sell_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') sell_date,sell_many from sell where sell_shopnum=#{shop_num} and sell_date like to_date(#{date_ps},'yyyy-MM-dd')

select to_char(sell_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') sell_date, count(*) count ,sum(s.sell_cash) sell_cash, sh.SHOP_NAME sell_shopname from sell s, shop sh where s.SELL_SHOPNUM = sh.shop_num and sh.SHOP_num like #{shop_num} and( sell_date >= to_date(#{startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and sell_Date <= to_date(#{enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd')) group by to_char(sell_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,sh.SHOP_NAME ORDER BY 1
select s.sell_num sell_num,m.mem_name sell_memname,s.sell_pronum sell_pronum,s.sell_cash sell_cash,sell_many from sell s, member m where s.sell_memnum = m.mem_num and sell_num =#{sellnum}
